SEARCH
Package net.tnemc.core.currency.format

Interface FormatRule

All Known Implementing Classes:
DecimalRule, DenomFormat, MajorAmountRule, MajorNameRule, MajorRule, MaterialRule, MinorAmountRule, MinorNameRule, MinorRule, PlaceHolderRule, ShortenJRule, ShortenRule, SymbolRule
public interface FormatRule
Represents a single formatting rule, which is used to add to a currency's formatting.
Since:
0.1.2.0
Author:
creatorfromhell

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default String
    description()
    Retrieves the description of the format rule.
    String
    format(@Nullable Account account, HoldingsEntry entry, String format)
    Used to format a TNE format string based on the provided holdings and account information.
    default boolean

    Determines whether this format rule should be included in the menu.

    The identifier for this rule.

  • Method Details

    • name

      String name()
      The identifier for this rule.
      Returns:
      The human-friendly identifier for this rule.

    • description

      default String description()
      Retrieves the description of the format rule.
      Returns:
      The description of the format rule as a String.

    • includeInMenu

      default boolean includeInMenu()
      Determines whether this format rule should be included in the menu. By default, it is set to true.
      Returns:
      true if this format rule should be included in the menu, false otherwise.

    • format

      String format(@Nullable @Nullable Account account, HoldingsEntry entry, String format)
      Used to format a TNE format string based on the provided holdings and account information.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to use for this formatting.
      entry - The holdings entry to use for formatting.
      format - The format string that these should be provided for.
      Returns:
      The formatted string.
